title: Liverpool and Bayern Munich to battle for £20m winger Julian Brandt in the summer
text:
Liverpool and Bayern Munich to battle for £20m winger Julian Brandt in the summer Jurgen Klopp likes Brandt and has had the Bayer Leverkusen wide man watched several times Share Brandt could be leaving Leverkusen in the summer (Photo: Getty) Share Get Liverpool FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe 
Liverpool face stiff competition from Bayern Munich for German winger Julian Brandt . 
Reds boss Jurgen Klopp likes Brandt and has had the Bayer Leverkusen wide man watched several times. 
Klopp knows he must strengthen Liverpool's squad this summer and is preparing a move for the £20million-rated Brandt. 
However Bayern could beat Liverpool for Brandt's signature and it is understood they have opened talks over a possible move to the Allianz Arena. Brandt is in high demand (Photo: 2017 Getty Images) Read More Brandt has been capped by Germany at every level from under 15 to under 21 (Photo: 2016 Getty Images) The winger is valued at £20m (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) 
Brandt, 20, has huge potential and Bayern see him as a long-term replacement for Thiago Alcantara. 
The forward has been capped by Germany at every level from Under-15 to Under-21 and was part of their victorious team which won the Under-19 European Championships in 2014. 
Brandt opened up about the possibility of leaving Leverkusen earlier this month . Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
